channel.title: JDK 6, Update 2 (link inside) - Mod/Admin please read
channel.description:
Ok, I've seen countless posts from people asking where to find JDK 6, Update 2. Well, here it is. I don't really understand why people can't find it because it only took me 5 minutes. But anyways, here's the link...
http://java.sun.com/products/archive/j2se/6u2/index.html
Hope I helped, Chris
P.S. I think a Mod/Admin should make a new topic and post this link in it and make it a sticky. There will always be people asking where to find JDK 6, Update 2 and why JDK 6, Update 1, 3-6 wont work...
